result.reason: Legitimate tech debt — adding new connection properties requires changes in 6+ locations (ConnectionInfo, Inheritance, all serializers, config window), making feature development unnecessarily hard.
result.approach: Introduce attribute-based metadata on ConnectionInfo properties (e.g. [ConnectionProperty(Protocols, Inheritable, SharedOrPersonal)]) and refactor serializers/config UI to discover properties via reflection, eliminating manual update in 6+ locations when adding new properties. Phase 1: attributes + config UI auto-discovery. Phase 2: serializer auto-discovery. Large refactor — defer to future milestone.

attempts.raw_output:
This is a well-documented architectural debt issue requesting a fundamental redesign of how connection properties are modeled. It's a large-scope refactoring affecting serializers, inheritance, UI config, and the core `ConnectionInfo` model.
